title: 5 killed in Taiwan earthquake
author: Unknown
text: Cranes and scaffolding fell from the 60th floor of a high-rise building site after a powerful earthquake jolted Taiwan yesterday, killing five construction workers, authorities said. Local officials said the quake registered magnitude 6.8, but the U.S. Geological Survey estimated it higher, at 7.1. The government's Disaster Control Center said about 220 people were injured across the  island.Caption:  photoChen Kui-hen / The Associated Press : Cranes and scaffolding fell from the 60th floor of a high-rise building site after a powerful earthquake jolted Taiwan yesterday, killing five construction workers, authorities said. Local officials said the quake registered magnitude 6.8, but the U.S. Geological Survey estimated it higher, at 7.1. The government's Disaster Control Center said about 220 people were injured across the island.
